statements: DELETE FROM environmental_impact_reports WHERE impact_type = 'Water Pollution';
DELETE FROM environmental_impact_reports WHERE impact_type = 'Water Pollution' AND farm_id = '456e7890-e12a-34b5-c678-901223345600';
DELETE FROM farm_reports WHERE farm_name = 'Sunshine Farm';
DELETE FROM farm_reports WHERE farm_name = 'Sunshine Farms' AND crop_type = 'Corn';
DELETE FROM weather_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND temperature > 30 AND humidity < 60;
DELETE FROM pesticide_usage WHERE farm_id = 2002 AND usage_id > 500;
DELETE FROM Reports WHERE crop_id = 'c3ab0d61-6a8d-4ab7-9827-f9e24efb0006' AND report_type = 'Pest Control';
